properties.value: Super combat potions are a stat boosting potion found in the Last Man Standing minigame that combines the effects of super attack and  super strength into one potion, increasing the player's Attack and Strength level respectively by 5 + 15%, rounded down. Unlike normal Super combat potions, these lack a super defence boost and an "Empty" option.

Super combat potions are a stat boosting potion found in the Last Man Standing minigame that combines the effects of super attack and super strength into one potion, increasing the player's Attack and Strength level respectively by 5 + 15%, rounded down. Unlike normal Super combat potions, these lack a super defence boost and an "Empty" option.

Effects[edit | edit source]

Stat boosts to Attack and Strength are calculated with: ⌊ S k i l l L e v e l × 15 100 ⌋ + 5 {\displaystyle \lfloor SkillLevel\times {\frac {15}{100}}\rfloor +5}

Level Boost Level Boost Level Boost
1-6 +5 34-39 +10 67-73 +15
7-13 +6 40-46 +11 74-79 +16
14-19 +7 47-53 +12 80-86 +17
20-26 +8 54-59 +13 87-93 +18
27-33 +9 60-66 +14 94-99 +19

'''Super combat potions''' are a stat boosting potion found in the [[Last Man Standing]] [[minigame]] that combines the effects of [[super attack]] and  [[super strength]] into one potion, increasing the player's [[Attack]] and [[Strength]] level respectively by 5 + 15%, rounded down. Unlike normal [[Super combat potion]]s, these lack a [[super defence]] boost and an "Empty" option.

==Effects==
Stat boosts to Attack and Strength are calculated with: <math>\lfloor SkillLevel \times \frac{15}{100} \rfloor + 5</math>
